title: shrI venkaTEsham
sahitya:
shrI venkaTEsham bhajAmi satatam shrtajana paripAlam gAnalOlam


anupallavi

  shrI bhUmijA ramaNam bhava taraNam nAma tIrtha rUpam bhU-vaikuNThapatim


caraNam    candra puSkariNi tIra vihAram indrAdi dEva pAda pUjitam
shrI bhUdEvi shita nitya kalyANavasantOtsava priyakaram
			(madhyamakAla)
shankha cakra dharam shankha nAda priyakaram gOvindam
vidhi guruguhAdi pUjitAtma padam kaliyuga prasannam
